Jabatan Wakil Panglima TNI untuk Jalankan Tugas Khusus
07 Nov 2019, 15:09 by Rini Hairani


Jabatan Wakil Panglima TNI untuk Jalankan Tugas Khusus

KBRN,Â  Jakarta : Presiden Joko Widodo telah menandatangani Peraturan Presiden (Perpres) Nomor 66 Tahun 2019 tentang Susunan Organisasi Tentara Nasional Indonesia (TNI). Perpres bertanggal 18 Oktober 2019 salah satunya menghidupkan kembali posisi wakil panglima TNI yang sebelumnya pernah dihapus oleh Presiden ke-4 RI Abdurrahman Wahid yang akrab disapa Gus Dur.Juru Bicara Presiden Fadjroel Rahman mengatakan keberadaan wakil panglima TNI, termasuk juga wakil menteri dibentuk untuk menjalankan tugas khusus atau prioritas yang diberikan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi)."Posisi terkait dengan wakil menteri, wakil panglima, jelas kriterianya dari bapak, selalu untuk menangani tugas khusus atau tugas prioritas," kata Fadjroel di Kompleks Istana Kepresidenan Jakarta, Kamis (07/11/2019).Ketika disinggung nama - nama calon kandidat wakil panglima TNI. Fadjroel enggan menjawab dan menyarankan untuk bertanya langsung kepada Panglima TNI Hadi Tjahjanto."Lebih baik ditanyakan pada panglima TNI, karena itu kebutuhan kan biasanya kebutuhan langsung," ujarnya.Adapun Peraturan Presiden Nomor 66 Tahun 2019 tentang Susunan Organisasi Tentara Nasional Indonesia (TNI), sebagaimana pasal 15 ayat (1), wakil panglima TNI merupakan koordinator pembinaan kekuatan TNI guna mewujudkan interoperabilitas atau Tri Matra Terpadu yang berkedudukan di bawah dan bertanggung jawab kepada panglima TNI.Sementara itu tugas Wakil Panglima TNI sebagaimana pasal 15 ayat (2) terdiri dari empat hal. Pertama, membantu pelaksanaan tugas harian Panglima TNI.Kedua, memberikan saran kepada Panglima TNI terkait pelaksanaan kebijakan pertahanan negara, pengembangan postur TNI, pengembangan doktrin, strategi militer, serta pembinaan dan penggunaan kekuataan TNI.Ketiga, melaksanakan tugas Panglima TNI apabila berhalangan sementara atau tetap."Melaksanakan tugas lain yang diperintahkan oleh Panglima," bunyi Pasal 15 ayat (2) huruf d Perpres 66 Tahun 2019.Sementara itu terkait dengan kepangkatan Wakil Panglima TNI, sebagaimana ketentuan Perpres, wakil panglima akan dijabat oleh Perwira Tinggi Bintang 4.Jabatan Wakil Panglima TNI terakhir dijabat oleh Jenderal TNI (purn) Fachrul Razi yang kini menjadi Menteri Agama. Saat itu, Fachrul diketahui menggantikan Laksamana TNI (purn) Widodo A.S yang ditunjuk menjadi Panglima TNI menggantikan Jenderal TNI (purn) Wiranto.

Position of Deputy TNI Commander to Carry Out Special Tasks
Nov 7 2019, 15:09 by Rini Hairani


Position of Deputy TNI Commander to Carry Out Special Tasks

KBRN, Jakarta: President Joko Widodo has signed Presidential Regulation (Perpres) Number 66 Year 2019 concerning the Organizational Structure of the Indonesian National Army (TNI). Presidential Regulation dated October 18, 2019, one of which revived the position of deputy TNI commander who had previously been removed by the 4th Indonesian President Abdurrahman Wahid, who was familiarly called Gus Dur. Presidential Spokesman Fadjroel Rahman said the presence of TNI deputy commanders, including the deputy minister was formed to carry out duties special or priority given by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi). "The position is related to the deputy minister, deputy commander, clear criteria from the father, always to handle special tasks or priority tasks," Fadjroel said at the Presidential Palace Complex in Jakarta, Thursday (11/07) /2019).When alluded to the names of candidates for deputy TNI commander candidates. Fadjroel was reluctant to answer and suggested asking the TNI Commander Hadi Tjahjanto directly. "It is better to ask the TNI commander, because it is usually a direct need," he said. As for Presidential Regulation No. 66 of 2019 concerning the Structure of the Indonesian Armed Forces Organization (TNI), as in article 15 paragraph (1), the deputy commander of the TNI is the coordinator of fostering the strength of the TNI in order to realize interoperability or the Integrated Tri Matra which is located below and is responsible to the TNI commander. Meanwhile the duties of the Deputy TNI Commander as in article 15 paragraph (2) consist of four Thing. First, assisting in carrying out the daily duties of the TNI Commander. Second, providing advice to the TNI Commander regarding the implementation of national defense policies, developing the TNI posture, developing doctrine, military strategy, and fostering and using the TNI's power. Third, carrying out the duties of the TNI Commander if temporary or permanent "Carrying out other tasks ordered by the Commander in Chief," read Article 15 paragraph (2) letter d of Presidential Regulation 66 of 2019. Meanwhile, related to the rank of Deputy Commander of the TNI, as stipulated in the Presidential Regulation, the deputy commander will be held by a High Star Officer 4. Deputy Position The last TNI Commander was held by TNI General (ret) Fachrul Razi who is now the Minister of Religion. At that time, Fachrul was known to replace Admiral TNI (ret.) Widodo A.S who was appointed Commander of the TNI to replace General TNI (retired) Wiranto.
